Judul: WHAT'S NEXT FOR THE EMBATTLED THIRTY METER TELESCOPE
Abstrak:
A stand-off over plans to build a megatelescope on Hawaii’s tallest mountain
has entered its fifth week and shows no signs of stopping. Hundreds of protesters are
blocking access to Mauna Kea, the mountain on Hawaii’s Big Island where construction of
